    • Constructor Detail

      • FieldInformation

        FieldInformation(java.lang.String ownerName,
                 java.lang.String fieldName,
                 java.lang.String description,
                 CcddClassesDataTable.InputType inputType,
                 int charSize,
                 boolean isRequired,
                 CcddConstants.ApplicabilityType applicability,
                 java.lang.String value,
                 boolean isInherited,
                 java.awt.Component inputFld,
                 int id)
        Data field information class constructor
        Parameters:
        ownerName - name of the table, including the path if this table represents a structure, or group for which the field is a member
        fieldName - field name
        description - data field description; used as the tool tip for this field
        charSize - field display size in characters
        inputType - field input type (InputType)
        isRequired - true if a value is required for this field
        applicability - field applicability type; all tables, parent tables only, or child tables only
        value - field value
        isInherited - true if the field is inherited from its owner table's type definition (ignored if the field does not belong to a table)
        inputFld - reference to the field's UndoableTextField or UndoableCheckBox; null if creating the data field without specifying the input field
        id - ID for the row defining the field; -1 for a new field
